adept.common
Class EntityMention

java.lang.Object
  adept.common.Item
      adept.common.HltContent
          adept.common.Chunk
              adept.common.EntityMention

public class EntityMention
extends Chunk

The Class EntityMention, which is a sequence of tokens that refer to an Entity with mention type that is drawn from an ontology
